name: Greedy Spiders Smash Free
description:
A bunch of new greedy and hungry spiders will be in your way. This time you will have to…SMASH THEM ALL!

Are you ready for this new adventure?
Be fast, be smart and train your fingers!

Collect the candies and save the little bugs before is too late. Think carefully, but be fast. These spiders are hungrier than ever!
18 brand new free levels!
Prove yourself in 3 real time bonus challenges. How fast can you be?

Become a fan of Greedy Spiders on Facebook
http://facebook.greedyspiders.com

Visit our site
http://www.greedyspiders.com

Any problems you may encounter, please let us know by sending us an email, or through our Facebook page.
